Title: Regional expression profiles of autistic brain
Description: The autism dataset from Voineagu et al. 2011, extracted from the Gene Expression Omnibus (accession number GSE28521). See ?sampleTable for metadata.

Title: Metadata for regional expression profiles of autistic brain
Description: The metadata for the autism dataset (Voineagu et al. 2011). See ?autism_data for expression data.

Title: Regional astrocyte expression profiles in experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis
Description: The astrocyte dataset from Itoh et al. PNAS. 2018, extracted from the supplementary materials. See astrocyte_metadata for metadata.

Title: Metadata for regional astrocyte expression profiles in experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis
Description: The metadata for the astrocyte Ribotag dataset (Itoh et al. PNAS. 2018). See ?astrocyte_data for expression data.

Title: Astrocyte weighted gene coexpression networks
Description: The astrocyte networks from Tommasini and Fogel, BMC Bioinformatics, 2023. derived from the astrocyte Ribotag data from Itoh et al. PNAS. 2018.
